Class BarrierBullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet.Bullet

  • public class BarrierBullet
extends Bullet
    Bullet that acts as a barrier around the player, buffering a few hits for the player
    Author:
    bowenzhi
